Member Function Documentation

void voom::MechanicsNode::getProperty ( string  propertyName,
Real **  data,
uint &  length 
) [virtual]

Given a propertyName as input the Real data is filled with values and returned to the user. The integer length denotes the number of values stored in the Real array.

Parameters:
propertyName String name which defines which property needs to be returned
data Real array where results are stored. Memory is allocated in this routine. Whatever is stores in data is cleared initially and values are stored in it.
length Number of entires stored in the array data.

Reimplemented from voom::BaseNode.
